response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its significance and rarity, I am extending a special offer to you to purchase this product at a price of $1,250,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its full value, making it an attractive proposition for someone as discerning as yourself. I am confident that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Sincerely, Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
